message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me halfway and sell it to me for $90?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $140. This product is truly worth it, and I believe you'll find great value in it.
Hi Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand that $140 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $110. Can you consider that?
